results.name: default/wordpress-77695c4ff6-xh4wk

error.Text: couldn't find key WORDPRESS_DB_PASSWORD in ConfigMap default/wordpress-config

results.details:
Error: The ConfigMap 'wordpress-config' in the 'default' namespace lacks the key 'WORDPRESS_DB_PASSWORD'.

Solution: 1. Check if 'WORDPRESS_DB_PASSWORD' is in the ConfigMap. 2. If missing, add it using `kubectl edit configmap wordpress-config`. 3. Save changes and redeploy the affected pods.

results.name: default/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-77695c4ff6-xh4wk], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service is missing ready endpoints because the pod 'wordpress-77695c4ff6-xh4wk' isn't ready, but 1 ready pod is expected.

Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs wordpress-77695c4ff6-xh4wk`. 3. Resolve any issues. 4. Verify readiness probe configuration. 5. Ensure pod is running and ready.
